conversation_summary:
Enduring entities: your living-room walls inhale-exhale; Rudnick’s static silhouette; Oswell’s lip-sync lag; a cathedral stomach glowing violet-emerald where jester-hat shavings drift like plankton; a ceiling-eye that deletes smoke before it forms.  

Scene: album-cover membrane sealing teeth, crystalline beats sparking real haze, guests fading like dropped frames.  

Motifs: swallowing media, surveillance that pre-remembers, vapor as verdict, yanking art from the gut to stay alive.
